mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARDTYPE T ON B.BOARD_CODE = T.BOARD_CODE LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT, B.NEWS_REPORTER, TO_CHAR(B.B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS B_CREATE_DATE, I.IMG_PATH FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG I ON (B.BOARD_NO = I.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
